text: Well, well, well. Here I thought you might try to back out.

You look like a deer caught in headlights. 
 Not your usual haunt, I take it?

A thrill seeker, eh? Let's see if we can't find your 
 breaking point.

Oh, is that a tinge of fear I sense? There's nothing 
 to be afraid of - unless you hate fun.
Hmph! You clearly have no respect for the craft of horror. ...Yet.

That being said, I think you've got the makings of a 
haunted house yourself. I'd be happy to walk you through 
the process, if you're at all curious...

You know, just last night I oversaw an occult ritual 
 and somehow that was the creepiest 
 thing I've heard all week... I like it.

You're pretty bold - I'm impressed. I think 
 the two of us are going to get along juuuuust fine...
Brave of you to say that straight to my face. You're fun.

Alas, the night is young, and I'm not 
 getting any younger. Stay safe - or don't.
Oh, come ON! Don't tell me *that's* all it takes to turn you into a blubbering mess!
Ugh, you're no fun. What a boring way to spend my night...
